tag: ***** ahhh this is so sweet, especially after the sentences that were related to closing the eyes

title: The Power of a Casual Check-in Text - The New York Times
description: New research says most of us underestimate the power of the casual check-in.
tag: ***** i think i should increase the habit of random texting

title: Classic Reviews: Pierre Bayard, How to Talk About Books You Haven’t Read (2007) | World Literature Today
description: “As a dyed-in-the-wool, first-page-to-last reader, I could not disagree more with Bayard’s theses; yet I have been amused, bemused, and invigorated by this book, despite the sense that the joke, inevitably, is on me,” Warren Motte on Pierre Bayard's How to Talk about Books You Haven't Read
tag: * I love the way words of different emotions are kept together

title: Social anxiety isn't about being liked - by Chris Lakin
description: There's this popular idea that socially anxious folks are just dying to be liked.
author: Chris Lakin
tag: ** tried to understand my social anxiety but I was not successsful

title: Happy Endings - by Oldster Magazine and Gail
description: Part II of Gail Rice’s story about hiring younger male escorts at 70.
author: Oldster Magazine
tag: **** some elaborative description and explanation on the previous event distracted me but in ovarall it's a good reading

title: For my 70th Birthday I Hired an Escort - by Gail

tag: ***** awesome read, i was imagining every lines, and even price of $1750 haha

title: Python, the movie! The programming language’s origin story comes to the silver screen

tag: **** kind of nice amazed to see how the nerd is becoming celebrity

title: How to find the papers you need to read — and avoid the ones you don’t
description: With thousands of papers being published everyday, it can be a task working out which matter. Here are some tips to help you decide.

title: Sora 2 - Sam Altman
description:
We are launching a new app called Sora. This is a combination of a new model called Sora 2, and a new product that makes it easy to create, share, and view videos.

This feels to many of us like...
tag: ** We are aware of how addictive a service like this could become... what a lovely way to express

title: Writing left-handed again | Phong's blog
description: I am left-handed. I do everything, hold everything, touch everything, all starting with my left hand first. Except for writing.
tag: **** I don't know the reason behind promoting right hand, but it is nice to read someone

title: David Foster Wallace Tried to Warn Us About these Eight Things
description: This author, who committed suicide in 2008, is more timely now than ever before—for the worst possible reasons.

tag: ***** I think his thinking is far more forward than his time. one fine example of who control our screens is tiktok.

title: If memory is precious to you then go ahead and record everything! | Aeon Essays
description: Our memories are precious to us and constitute our sense of self. Why not enhance them by recording all of your life?

title: What Are Clarke's Laws?
description: Clarke's Laws are a series of rules proposed by science fiction legend Arthur C. Clarke as a means of evaluating scientific concepts.

title: This Map Is Not Upside Down
description: While conventional and commonplace today, maps have not always had north at the top. And they don't need to.

title: David Lynch's LA house is for sale: take a peek | Wallpaper*

title: Grief doesn't have a timeline. Grief is being human. Loss.
description: Grief gets an expiration date. Just like us.

title: ‘I love you too!’ My family’s creepy, unsettling week with an AI toy | Artificial intelligence (AI) | The Guardian
